spec.name: Central park of Ain Chok
spec.description: The Central Park of Ain Chok (Parc Central d'Aïn Chock) is a significant green space serving the Aïn Chock neighborhood of Casablanca. As a central park for the district, it provides essential recreational and natural amenities for residents in a typically densely populated area. It is a hub for community life, offering pathways for walking and jogging, and open spaces for leisure and play, contributing to the urban quality of life.
